title: Nurf is obviously not happening, or will happen only until 12.00 tomoro
body:
Obvious troll is obvious, don't know why people are getting so angry and mad. I highly doubt it will even be a mode and it will just be Urf. It they do have nurf it will only be until 12.00 tomoro as that is the rule for April fools. Correct me f I'm wrong tomoro but I'm calling this one early. 
PS I'm so keen to play both modes tomoro and hope everyone has fun :D

replies.body: I honestly hope it's real. and that they only release nurf. fucking satisfying feeding off the rage of the urf lovers.
lmao obviously someone had a bad experience in urf, or maybe your assholes too tight to have fun lol

> [{quoted}](name=Jakelarosa,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bHBWgOpX,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-03-31T02:25:44.433+0000)
>
> lmao obviously someone had a bad experience in urf, or maybe your assholes too tight to have fun lol

or maybe I got sick of all the threads asking for urf to come back. people over exaggerated how good it was. it became stale and repetitive after the first 3 days. you would see the same champs every game.
your sick of threads, are you riot..

> [{quoted}](name=Jakelarosa,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bHBWgOpX,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-31T03:08:34.037+0000)
>
> your sick of threads, are you riot..

no, but I've been in OCE since the start of the OCE server, and I've been on the forums for an equal amount of time.
And there are people who have been here since beta. Know your place...BACK ON TEH NA
Pretty much 80% of the lolplayers I know irl transfer from NA...and if I knew, I would have started my acc on NA sever and get mah free sexy ziggs skin
Or perhaps certain people were just annoyed by the constant spam of "bring back URF" despite Riot having already said they're planning to.
I really hope they **ONLY** release NURF, serves people right for spamming for URFs return.

^^
Yup, and I can't wait for what they will be spamming as well :)
I thought it was easter tomorrow. I suck at remembering what date it is

I doubt they will release two versions, most likely just one mode will be released, 
NURF will be fun, its kind of like a slow motion league of legends.
